description: Art director Cal Driver has dark-and-hungsome Todd Baron and boyish cute blond Ron Pearson stop up at hispenthouse pad for a look at the slides from their recent fashion shoot. Dissolve to a give 'n take three way with tight-toresoed Ron taking Cal and Todd for all they've got - and that's a lot!
series: Falcon Bareback Vol 08 - Blue Collar Balling
title: Falcon Bareback Vol 08 - Blue Collar Balling
